RockstarNews.Headline: Welcome to GTA Connected.
RockstarNews.Body: Grand Theft Auto Connected is a multiplayer replacement modification to gta iv to make it easy to play online.

RockstarNews.Headline: Grand Theft RevIVal
RockstarNews.Body: Welcome to Grand Theft RevIVal Service we have events at http://discord.gg/gtrf This server is good for reviving GFWL edition of GTA IV.
